name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text: Your Turn On Play: If your Leader is multicolored and your opponent has 7 or less DON!! cards on their field, your opponent rests 1 active DON!! card at the start of your opponent's Main Phase.

effect.text: If your Leader is multicolored and your opponent has 7 or less DON!! cards on their field, your opponent rests 1 active DON!! card at the start of your opponent's Main Phase.
conditions: your opponent has 7 or less DON!! cards on their field
